question: You have recently landed in a foreign country on a work visa and need information about the place in and around the city. Write a letter to the relocation assistance provider seeking help and in your letter,Write why you are writing the letterWhat kind of information you wantHow and by when you can get the requested information
text: I am writing this letter for your guidance in assisting me regarding the city as I have immigrated yesterday to this place. I wanted to know about the places surrounding New York city as I will be working here mostly.

Moreover, could you find any suitable places to stay such as hostels, apartments or condos. I do not have any relatives or friends here to take me around therefore you can guide me as to how to initiate the process of living in this challenging city. You can also help me to look for any other visa formalities or licensing information which is crucial.

You could get in touch with me by calling on my cell phone or you can contact my mentor at the workplace. If possible you can send me the above details before this weekend as I will be joining the office after the busy weekend.
